attributes.title: Convert Your Obsessive Compulsive Disorders To Ishtadevata Inspired Decisions!
attributes.description:
30 APR 2020 - THURSDAY - 09:50 AM - NITHYANANDA SATSANG GIST

*TODAY, SIXTH DAY OF THE CHITHIRAI BRAHMOTSAVAM HAPPENING IN ALL THE KAILASAS ALL OVER THE WORLD.

*TODAY, MEENAKSHI PARASHAKTI IS GRACING IN SARVA ALANKARA IN RAJATA RISHABHA VAHANA AND NITHYANANDESHWARA SOMASUNDARESHWARA ALONG WITH PARASHAKTI MEENAKSHI IS GRACING IN SARVA ALANKARA IN SWARNA RISHABHA VAHANA.

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*INVOKE COSMIC BEING IN YOUR IDENTITY. YOU CAN INVOKE GANESHA OR SUBRAMANYA, SHIVA, DEVI, VISHNU, SURYA, ANY ONE OF THE COSMIC BEING. YOU WILL MANIFEST SUCH EXTRAORDINARY ENERGY AND HIGHER LIFE.

*FUNDAMENTALLY, HINDUISM IS SCIENCE OF INVOKING COSMIC BEINGS IN YOU. THAT IS WHY BEFORE EVEN YOU START DEVELOPING THE PRIMAL OCD (OBSESSIVE COMPULSIVE DISORDER) YOU START DEVELOPING BEFORE AGE OF SEVEN WHAT I CALL ‘ROOT PATTERN’ - BEING DRIVEN BY FEAR AND GREED.

*ALL HUMAN BEINGS OTHER THAN WHO ARE INITIATED BEFORE THE AGE OF 7 AND STARTED MANIFESTING THEIR ISHTA DEVATA, EVERYONE ELSE, IS SUFFERING WITH OCD.

*SOCIETY, UNCONSCIOUS HUMANITY, POLITICIANS, EVERYONE WANTS YOU TO BE HAVING OCD SO YOU CAN BE EXPLOITED.

*THE IDEA THAT MONEY IS SECURITY FOR YOUR FUTURE, THE IDEA OF INSURANCE V- 401K - THE INDIAN RETIREMENT INSURANCE... ALL THIS IS OCD YOU ARE FORCED TO BELIEVE.

*THE OCD IN THE CORE OF YOUR BEING AND VARIOUS STUPID IDEAS YOU ARE MADE TO BELIEVE AND THOSE IDEAS START DEVELOPING OBSESSIVE COMPULSIONS.

*IN THE BEGINNING YOU ARE BRAINWASHED BY SOCIETY AND MASS MEDIA CULT THAT MONEY IS THE ONLY SECURITY FOR FUTURE. ONCE YOU START GETTING BRAINWASHED, THE OCD STARTS IN EVERY LEVEL. YOU FEEL MONEY IS THE ONLY THING IN LIFE. THEN ALL THE BELIEFS, THOUGHT CURRENTS RELATED TO MONEY AND TO THE ACTIONS YOU PERFORM BECAUSE OF THE OCD - EVERYTHING PUT TOGETHER, IS WHAT I CALL AS DELUSION.

*PEOPLE WHO BRAINWASH YOU, THE METHODOLOGY THEY USE TO BRAINWASH YOU AND HOW YOU START GETTING BRAINWASHED IN THE INITIAL LEVEL AND AFTER SOME TIME EVEN IF YOU KNOW YOU HAVE ENOUGH MONEY TO BUY ANYTHING MONEY CAN BUY, EVEN AFTER ACQUIRING SO MUCH MONEY, YOU DON'T STOP WORKING FOR MONEY, BECAUSE IT HAS BECOME OCD IN YOU BY THEN.

*CORONA HAS TAUGHT A BIG LESSON TO HUMANITY - THAT MONEY IS NOT SECURITY FOR FUTURE.

*I WANTED TO TELL EVERY HUMAN BEING: RICH CONSCIOUSNESS IS THE MOST POWERFUL SECURITY. IF YOU CAN MANIFEST A POWER, IF YOU CAN JUST LIVE BLISSFULLY IN AN UNCLUTCHED WAY, IF YOU CAN JUST RADIATE CONSCIOUSNESS IN YOU AND IN THE PEOPLE AROUND YOU, THAT IS THE MOST POWERFUL IMPORTANT SECURITY.

*GET INITIATED AND START THE MANIFESTING THE COSMIC BEING IN YOUR IDENTITY. UNDERSTAND: PARAMASHIVA EXISTS. HE IS A LIVING BEING, ALIVE, WHO CAN RESPOND TO YOU NOW - ALL-POWERFUL, ALL-KNOWING, WHO JUST CREATES, MAINTAINS, DESTROYS, REJUVENATES, PUTS IN DELUSION, PULLS OUT OF DELUSION, LIBERATES, WHO PLAYS WITH THESE TATTVAS AND PRINCIPLES! INVOKE HIM IN YOUR IDENTITY - WHAT YOU FEEL AS THE CORE OF YOU.

*WHEN YOU INVOKE HIM IN YOU, IT NEEDS ONLY TWO THINGS: INITIATION AND YOUR CONSCIOUS WILL PERSISTENCE ASKING HIM TO MANIFEST IN YOU.

*WHEN YOU INVOKE HIM, THE FEAR-BASED OCD’S BECOME IRRELEVANT. I AM NOT SAYING DON'T GO TO JOB, DON'T EARN MONEY. I AM ONLY SAYING LET THIS JOB AND EARNING MONEY NOT BE YOUR OCD. DON'T YOU SEE, TONNES OF THINGS YOU ARE PERFORMING, YOU ARE DOING AS ‘OCD’!

*FOR EXAMPLE, WE BOTH MAYBE SITTING IN THE SAME NITHYANANDA SABHA. IF A SNAKE COMES THERE, YOU WILL ALSO MOVE OUT, I WILL ALSO MOVE OUT, BUT WITH A DIFFERENT CONTEXT. YOU CAN CHECK MY PULSE, IT WOULD NOT HAVE INCREASED. I WILL NOT MOVE OUT AS AN OCD. I AM ONLY SAYING, DON'T DO IT AS AN OCD, DO IT OUT OF EXTREME CLARITY.

*HINDU IS A BEING WHO INVOKES COSMIC BEING IN HIS IDENTITY. YOUR ISHTA DEVATA BECOMES YOUR CORE EXISTENCE.

*HINDUISM GIVES BEAUTIFUL CHOICES - YOU CAN CONNECT WITH GANESHA, SUBRAHMANYA, PARAMASHIVA, NATARAJA, ARUNACHALESHWARA, SUNDARESHWARA, CHOKKA, VEERABADRA, PARASHAKTI, VISHNU, KRISHNA, RAMA, HANUMAN, SURYA - DIFFERENT FORMS! YOU CAN CHOOSE YOUR ISHTA DEVATA. EVEN GURU CANT CHANGE IT. GURU CAN CHOOSE IT FOR YOU IF YOU REQUEST HIM TO CHOOSE, BUT HE CANNOT CHANGE YOUR CHOSEN ISHTA DEVATA AND CAN GIVE MANTRA ONLY FOR THAT YOU CHOSE.

*INVOKE THE ISHTA DEVATA IN YOUR IDENTITY. MORNING WHEN YOU WAKE UP, IT SHOULD NOT BE OCD, IT SHOULD BE IID - ISHTA DEVATA INSPIRED DECISION!
